references: V. Chvatal, Some unknown Van der Waerden numbers, pp. 31-33 of R. K. Guy et al., editors, Combinatorial Structures and Their Applications (Proceedings Calgary Conference Jun 1969}), Gordon and Breach, NY, 1970.
